page.title: 12A Day In The Life Of....
page.content: A normal day in my life starts by me waking up at 7.30, then I usually have a read until about 7.40 when I go down-stairs to have cerial for breakfast. I then try to get to the bathroom before my brother Ben to clean my teeth, wash my face and brush my hair. Then I get dressed at about 8.00 and get my things ready for school. I go to school at 8.30 and play until 8.55 when we go into school. In school we do some work and have register and at 9.10 we go for assembly. After assembly we do Maths and English group work until break at 10.30. After play we do more class work until lunch at 12.10. After lunch we have play until 1.10 and then we lessons until last play from 2.30 to 2.45. School ends at 3.30, when I go home and play with my brother Ben.
